New Records: Christian Eriksen scored a late winner to secure Denmark's 2-1 victory over Sweden in their pre-Euro 2024 friendly
Key Match Events: Denmark opened the scoring with a goal from a corner kick in the first minute
Sweden equalized through Alexander Isak's strike seven minutes later
Christian Eriksen scored the winning goal in the 86th minute with a curling shot
Pre-Game Insights: Denmark's coach Kasper Hjulmand praised Sweden's aggressive man-to-man defense but criticized Denmark's turnover giveaways
Sweden's coach Jon Dahl Tomasson was inducted into the Danish Football Hall of Fame before the match
Post-Match Reflections: Christian Eriksen expressed satisfaction with his assist for Denmark's first goal and his late winner
Denmark's coach Kasper Hjulmand highlighted the importance of controlling possession and reducing turnovers
